importantArticles.headline: A decade is a very long time on Wall Street, but I'm confident in my thinking that AGNC Investment's (NASDAQ: AGNC) shares will be worth less than those of Prologis (NYSE: PLD) and Rexford Industrial (NYSE: REXR) in 10 years.  Here's why I believe investors who want a combination of income and capital appreciation will likely be better off with these two property-owning real estate investment trusts over mortgage-focused AGNC.  What does AGNC Investment do?

importantArticles.headline: Are you a passive income investor looking for a stock that can still pay dividends in a recession? You might be surprised to learn that mortgage real estate investment trust AGNC Investment (NASDAQ: AGNC) has paid investors a double-digit dividend since 2022 . Keep reading to find out why this stock could be well-positioned to boost your portfolio returns during a downturn.
